column17:
This set of coffee mugs from the house of UPC is crafted out of durable bone china material. The set contains 4 abstract printed mugs with a red background.

  • Category: Home Ware

  • Pattern: Printed

Care Tips
Wash with warm soapy water
Rinse and dry thoroughly
For removal of stubborn residues allow the dish to cool partially fill with warm soapy water and allow it to soak for 10 to 20 minutes before the wash
